name: Gate Check
description: Gate/verification step for quality gates. Checks contracts, policies, and requirements before allowing progression. Can block, approve, or bounce back.
default_objective: Verify {{check_type}} against {{requirements_source}}. Produce gate decision with clear MERGE, BOUNCE, or BLOCK recommendation.

parameters.name: check_type
parameters.title: Check Type
parameters.description: What to verify at this gate

parameters.name: allow_mechanical_fixes
parameters.title: Allow Mechanical Fixes
parameters.description: Whether gate can apply trivial fixes (lint, format) before deciding
